name: Pediatric Care
desc: we provide you with access to our entire network of pediatricians who specialize in health care for children.

name: Gynecology Care
desc: The gynologist provides a wide range of healthcare service that meet the needs of women all the stage of life.

name: Cardio Care
desc: Our specialists diagnose and manage full range of heart conditions,facilities and complete range of services.

name: Nephrology Care
desc: Our nephrologists (kidney doctors) direct all aspects of treatment, including early intervention,transplant.

name: Dental Care
desc: We deliver oral health care of the best standard to our patients by experienced dental surgeons and modern tech.

name: Hematology Care
desc: our doctors specialize in hematology (and oncology)  because we are on a mission to help others.
